thread.title: Windrush Scandal Highlights Case for U.K. Digital ID

author: Simon Nixon
title: Windrush Scandal Highlights Case for U.K. Digital ID
text:
Britainâ€™s shameful Windrush episode, in which citizens born overseas were treated as illegal immigrants because they were unable to prove their identity, has revived debate over whether the U.K. should adopt compulsory identity cards, as is common in many other European countries.
When Labour governments in the 2000s tried to introduce biometric identity cards, they ran into fierce opposition from those concerned that they amounted to an assault on civil liberties. Now, some former critics say they may be open to the idea....
